dialogues.speaker: Jameson
dialogues.text: Ah Ha! A visitor. Rooms at the tavern are half off!! I am Jameson, the local tavern keep. Why dont you come on in and take a load off?

dialogues.speaker: Jameson
dialogues.text: I still have some rooms available if you need one.

dialogues.speaker: Jameson
dialogues.text: Ah Ha! A visitor. Rooms at the tavern are half off!! I am Jameson, the local tavern keep. What brings you to town boy?

options.text: I am looking for the Lethe Farm.

dialogues.speaker: Jameson
dialogues.text: Ha! Happenings? You sound like that old kook that runs the smithy. Better watch who you say such things to boy, dont go scaring away my customers.

dialogues.speaker: Jameson
dialogues.text: Dont get me started! Arthur up and disappeared leaving me without a vendor for the tavern. If you ask me good riddance never really liked the man.

options.text: What was your problem with Arthur

dialogues.speaker: Jameson
dialogues.text: Bahh! Sounds like Arthur never holds up his side of a bargain. Sorry boy, maybe old man Otis knows more. I still have those rooms available if you need one.

dialogues.speaker: Jameson
dialogues.text: Honestly, always felt like the guy was up to know good since he took over that damned farm. But enough about that. I still have those rooms available if you need one.
